sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SPRING, Ver, in cosmography, denotes one of the seasons of the year ; commencing, in the northern parts of the world, on the day when the sun enters the first degree of Aries, which is about the 10th day of March, and ending when the sun leaves Gemini ; or, more strictly and gene rally, the spring begins on the day when the distance of the sunâ€™s meridian altitude from the zenith, being on the increase, is at a medium between the greatest and least. The end of the spring coincides with the beginning of summer.
